column4: hey has anyone setup ubuntu to launch firestarter at startup?

i tried and it didn't prompt me for a password or anything,BUT it did say i had no net connection,is there a way to have firestarter launch after i get a internet connection,or at least last of the startup programs?
chemilkalz,did that.i'm just interested in delaying its startup
you could change the runlevel at which it starts so that it starts after certain other daemon(s) start
